Xoliswa Sithole (amụrụ na 31 Disemba 1968) bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri na onye na-emepụta ihe nkiri na South Africa, nke a zụlitere na Zimbabwe
Ọ meriri BAFTA na 2004 maka ihe nkiri ya Orphans Of Nkandla
O ritere ihe nrite Peabody na 2010 nakwa BAFTA na 2011 maka ihe ngosi ya Zimbabwe's Forgotten Children
A mụrụ Xoliswa Sithole na South Africa ma zụlite ya na Zimbabwe mgbe afọ 1970 gasịrị

Nne ya nwụrụ n'ihi nsogbu ndị metụtara HIV/AIDS n'afọ 1995. Nwa nwanne nna ya, Ndabaningi Sithole, bụ onye guzobere Zimbabwe African National Union (ZANU), ma gbuo onye ọka iwu na onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Edison Sithole (1935-1975) bụ nwa nwanne ya. O nwetara akara ugo mmụta na Bekee na Mahadum Zimbabwe n'afọ 1987.

Dị ka onye na-eme ihe nkiri, Xoliswa Sithole mepụtara ma mee ihe nkiri a kpọrọ Shouting Silent (2002, 2011), ihe nkiri banyere ahụmịhe ezinụlọ ya na HIV/AIDS, ma duzie Zimbabwe's Forgotten Children (2010). Zimbabwe's Forgotten Children meriri Peabody Award na 2010

Ọ bụ onye na-emepụta ihe na The Orphans of Nkandla (2004), na-eme ka Sithole bụrụ nwanyị South Africa mbụ meriri ihe nrite BAFTA. Ihe nkiri ya apụtala mgbe niile na mmemme na African Film Festival New York, na mmemme ihe nkiri mba ụwa ndị ọzọ. N'afọ 1999 ọ bụ onye nnọchi anya South Africa na Cannes Film Festival
Sithole mepụtara South Africa from Triumph and Transition na Mandela maka CNN Prime Time, na usoro Real Lives maka telivishọn South Africa

Ihe nkiri na telivishọn ndị ọzọ Sithole rụrụ gụnyere Child of the Revolution (2005 - 2015), The First South African, Return to Zimbabwe, Martine and Thandeka (2009), South Africa's Lost Girls, na The Fall (2016)
"Enwere m naanị otu ọchịchọ na ndụ," ka ọ gwara onye na-agba ajụjụ ọnụ Audrey McCluskey, "Nanị otu iji mepụta ihe oyiyi na-agbanwe ụwa.
Ihe ngosi Sithole gụnyere ọrụ na ihe nkiri Cry Freedom (1987), Mandela (1987, telivishọn), Fools, na Chikin Biznis.
